title: Amazon shares in focus, OpenAI in talks for major partnership with retailer

title: Hut 8 shares jump as ex-bitcoin miner signs AI deal
description: Hut 8 has signed a deal valued at about US$7 billion to lease a data center in Louisiana, it said on Wednesday, as former cryptocurrency miners pivot to meet surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure
content:
Hut 8 has signed a deal valued at about US$7 billion to lease a data center in Louisiana, it said on Wednesday, as former cryptocurrency miners pivot to meet surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Bill proposes Rs 5 crore fine for Artificial Intelligence misuse: Expert outlines concerns
description: India introduces a bill proposing penalties up to Rs 5 crore for AI misuse, with recommendations for risk-based reviews, sector regulator integration, and safeguards to ensure lawful, transparent, and accountable AI deployment across sectors.

title: Electronics firm Jabil forecasts upbeat annual results on booming data center demand
description: Jabil forecast annual revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as the electronic component maker looks to capitalize on artificial intelligence-driven demand for data centers, sending its shares up more than 5.8% in premarket trade.
content:
It expects full-year 2026 revenues of $32.4 billion, above analysts' average expectations of $31.52 billion, according to data compiled by LSEG.

title: How New Technology is Shaping Modern Criminal Justice
description: Key Takeaways Technology is rapidly altering all aspects of the criminal justice process, from investigations to sentencing and beyond. Experts with digital and analytical skills are increasingly vital for modern law enforcement and corrections management. Digital forensics, artificial intelligence, and surveillance are improving outcomes, but they also demand new attention to ethical and privacy standards. […]

title: In rare rift with Trump, Utah leaders push back on new AI order
description: Some Utah leaders, including Gov. Spencer Cox, have expressed dismay at the order that clamps down on states' ability to regulate artificial intelligence.
content:
After President Donald Trump signed an executive order limiting states’ ability to regulate artificial intelligence, Utah’s elected officials are assessing how to push back, state Rep. Doug Fiefia said.

title: AI Chip Startup Mythic Raises $125 Million in Bid to Take on Nvidia
description: Chip startup Mythic Inc. has raised $125 million in a new funding round, money that will help support its attempt to challenge Nvidia Corp. in the lucrative market for artificial intelligence processors.
content:

title: AI in primary care: Experts warn of safety risks as tech outpaces regulation
description: From digital scribes to ChatGPT, artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly entering GP clinics. New University of Sydney research warns that technology is racing ahead of safety checks, putting patients and health systems at risk.
